effect_entries.effect: Teaches Swagger to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Swagger to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
相手を　怒らせて　混乱させる。
怒りで　相手の　攻撃は
ぐーんと　あがってしまう。

The user enrages and confuses the
target. However, this also sharply raises
the target’s Attack stat.

Chi la usa provoca il bersaglio e lo confonde,
facendo aumentare però di molto il suo Attacco.

Un cuaderno en el que se recogen, día a día, los
progresos de tu aventura.

Reizt das Ziel und verursacht Verwirrung.
Dies erhöht jedoch dessen Angriffs-Wert.

Fait enrager la cible et la plonge dans la
confusion, mais augmente fortement son Attaque.

상대를 화내게 해서 혼란시킨다.
분노로 상대의 공격은
크게 올라가 버린다.

おこらせて　こんらんさせる。
いかりで　あいての　こうげきは
ぐーんと　あがってしまう。

The user enrages and confuses the
target. However, it also sharply raises
the target’s Attack stat.

target. However, it also sharply raises
the target’s Attack stat.

la confusion, mais augmente fortement
son Attaque.

The user enrages the foe into
confusion. However, it also sharply
raises the foe’s Attack stat.
